name: G-Workplace
description:
G-Workplace is a prominent Google Apps Solution partner delivering a complete set of products and service related to Google Apps. G-Workplace believes that a Google cloud based desktop brings more value to employees and organisation then traditional desktop solutions. G-Workplace brings this vision to reality for customers across the globe with the aim of best of breed partners.
Our strength are our capabilities on Lotus Notes to Google Apps migration; our development expertise; and our focus on document and content management processes within Google Apps.
READ MORE...
